acf.concert_info:
We are excited to present the 2021 edition of PIVOT – our biennial national early-career composer mentorship program with the Canadian League of Composers and the Canadian Music Centre.

The result of this work is six extraordinary world premieres for the Continuum piano trio (and subset), recorded live and broadcast over three nights in special online digital presentations that will be available to watch on YouTube, Facebook.
